author: samwilsn
content: Warming it up requires a witness?

author: pipermerriam
content: I think constant cost, mostly because it's simpler and I have a hard time seeing how a variable cost system would improve the situation.  Just because something is **REALLY** cold, doesn't necessarily make is less valuable or less likely to be needed and it's hard for me to see what extra value is added by making the cost variable.

author: pipermerriam
content: (also, this is probably a conversation for <#796057759858425866> or maybe <#739145593762611250> as this channel is more focused on the historical blocks/headers/receipts type of data.)
